View.SQL: select "AREA"."ID", "AREA"."CODE", "AREATRANSLATION"."NAME" from "APP"."AREA" as "AREA", "APP"."AREATRANSLATION" as "AREATRANSLATION" WHERE "AREATRANSLATION"."LOCALE" = '@@LOCALE@@' AND "AREATRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "AREA"."ID" AND "AREA"."AREA_TYPE" = 'Country'

select "AREA"."ID", "AREA"."CODE", "AREATRANSLATION"."NAME" from "APP"."AREA" as "AREA", "APP"."AREATRANSLATION" as "AREATRANSLATION" WHERE "AREATRANSLATION"."LOCALE" = '@@LOCALE@@' AND "AREATRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "AREA"."ID" AND "AREA"."AREA_TYPE" = 'Area'

select "AREA"."ID", "AREA"."INCOMEGROUP_ID", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME" from "APP"."AREA" as "AREA", "APP"."CATEGORYTRANSLATION" as "CATEGORYTRANSLATION" WHERE "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."LOCALE" ='@@LOCALE@@' AND "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "AREA"."INCOMEGROUP_ID" AND "AREA"."AREA_TYPE" = 'Country'

select DISTINCT "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORY"."CODE" from "APP"."CATEGORY" as "CATEGORY", "APP"."CATEGORYTRANSLATION" as "CATEGORYTRANSLATION", "APP"."CATEGORY_TAGS" as "CATEGORY_TAGS" WHERE "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."CATEGORY_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."TAGS_ID" = (SELECT ID FROM "APP"."CATEGORY" WHERE "CODE"='CHANNEL_TAG') group by "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME", "CATEGORY"."CODE" order by CASE WHEN "CATEGORY"."ID" IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, "CATEGORY"."ID" ASC, CASE WHEN "CATEGORY"."CODE" IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, "CATEGORY"."CODE" ASC

select "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME", "CATEGORY"."CODE" from "APP"."CATEGORY" as "CATEGORY", "APP"."CATEGORYTRANSLATION" as "CATEGORYTRANSLATION", "APP"."CATEGORY_TAGS" as "CATEGORY_TAGS" WHERE "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."LOCALE" ='@@LOCALE@@' AND "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."CATEGORY_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."TAGS_ID" = (SELECT ID FROM "APP"."CATEGORY" WHERE "CODE"='CHANNEL_TAG') group by "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME", "CATEGORY"."CODE" order by CASE WHEN "CATEGORY"."ID" IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, "CATEGORY"."ID" ASC, CASE WHEN "CATEGORY"."CODE" IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, "CATEGORY"."CODE" ASC

select "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME", "CATEGORY"."CODE" from "APP"."CATEGORY" as "CATEGORY", "APP"."CATEGORYTRANSLATION" as "CATEGORYTRANSLATION", "APP"."CATEGORY_TAGS" as "CATEGORY_TAGS" WHERE "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."LOCALE" ='@@LOCALE@@' AND "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."CATEGORY_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."TAGS_ID" = (SELECT ID FROM "APP"."CATEGORY" WHERE "CODE"='ALL_TYPE_OF_AID_TAG') group by "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME", "CATEGORY"."CODE" order by CASE WHEN "CATEGORY"."ID" IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, "CATEGORY"."ID" ASC, CASE WHEN "CATEGORY"."CODE" IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, "CATEGORY"."CODE" ASC

select "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME", "CATEGORY"."CODE" from "APP"."CATEGORY" as "CATEGORY", "APP"."CATEGORYTRANSLATION" as "CATEGORYTRANSLATION", "APP"."CATEGORY_TAGS" as "CATEGORY_TAGS" WHERE "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."LOCALE" ='@@LOCALE@@' AND "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."CATEGORY_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."TAGS_ID" = (SELECT ID FROM "APP"."CATEGORY" WHERE "CODE"='TYPE_OF_FLOW_TAG') group by "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME", "CATEGORY"."CODE" order by CASE WHEN "CATEGORY"."ID" IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, "CATEGORY"."ID" ASC, CASE WHEN "CATEGORY"."CODE" IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, "CATEGORY"."CODE" ASC

select "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME", "CATEGORY"."CODE" from "APP"."CATEGORY" as "CATEGORY", "APP"."CATEGORYTRANSLATION" as "CATEGORYTRANSLATION", "APP"."CATEGORY_TAGS" as "CATEGORY_TAGS" WHERE "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."LOCALE" ='@@LOCALE@@' AND "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."CATEGORY_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."TAGS_ID" = (SELECT ID FROM "APP"."CATEGORY" WHERE "CODE"='ALL_TYPE_OF_FINANCE_TAG') group by "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME", "CATEGORY"."CODE" order by CASE WHEN "CATEGORY"."ID" IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, "CATEGORY"."ID" ASC, CASE WHEN "CATEGORY"."CODE" IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, "CATEGORY"."CODE" ASC

select "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME", "CATEGORY"."CODE" from "APP"."CATEGORY" as "CATEGORY", "APP"."CATEGORYTRANSLATION" as "CATEGORYTRANSLATION", "APP"."CATEGORY_TAGS" as "CATEGORY_TAGS" WHERE "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."LOCALE" ='@@LOCALE@@' AND "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."CATEGORY_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."TAGS_ID" = (SELECT ID FROM "APP"."CATEGORY" WHERE "CODE"='TYPE_OF_FINANCE_TAG') group by "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME", "CATEGORY"."CODE" order by CASE WHEN "CATEGORY"."ID" IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, "CATEGORY"."ID" ASC, CASE WHEN "CATEGORY"."CODE" IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, "CATEGORY"."CODE" ASC

select "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME", "CATEGORY"."CODE" from "APP"."CATEGORY" as "CATEGORY", "APP"."CATEGORYTRANSLATION" as "CATEGORYTRANSLATION", "APP"."CATEGORY_TAGS" as "CATEGORY_TAGS" WHERE "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."LOCALE" ='@@LOCALE@@' AND "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."CATEGORY_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."TAGS_ID" = (SELECT ID FROM "APP"."CATEGORY" WHERE "CODE"='ALL_SECTOR_TAG') group by "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME", "CATEGORY"."CODE" order by CASE WHEN "CATEGORY"."ID" IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, "CATEGORY"."ID" ASC, CASE WHEN "CATEGORY"."CODE" IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, "CATEGORY"."CODE" ASC

select "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME", "CATEGORY"."CODE" from "APP"."CATEGORY" as "CATEGORY", "APP"."CATEGORYTRANSLATION" as "CATEGORYTRANSLATION", "APP"."CATEGORY_TAGS" as "CATEGORY_TAGS" WHERE "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."LOCALE" ='@@LOCALE@@' AND "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."PARENT_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."CATEGORY_ID" = "CATEGORY"."ID" AND "CATEGORY_TAGS"."TAGS_ID" = (SELECT ID FROM "APP"."CATEGORY" WHERE "CODE"='BI_MULTILATERAL_TAG') group by "CATEGORY"."ID", "CATEGORYTRANSLATION"."NAME", "CATEGORY"."CODE" order by CASE WHEN "CATEGORY"."ID" IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, "CATEGORY"."ID" ASC, CASE WHEN "CATEGORY"."CODE" IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, "CATEGORY"."CODE" ASC

View.name: FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW
View.SQL: select ft.*, cat.coefficient from FINANCIALTRANSACTION ft left join CATEGORY cat ON cat.id = ft.channel_id WHERE ft.draft = false OR draft IS NULL

MeasureExpression.SQL: (1 / (SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."AMOUNTS_EXTENDED_CURR" AND BASE_CURRENCY = '@@COUNTRY_CURRENCY@@' AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."DRAFT" IS NOT NULL AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")))
CASE WHEN coefficient IS NULL THEN AMOUNTS_EXTENDED_AMOUNT ELSE (AMOUNTS_EXTENDED_AMOUNT * COEFFICIENT) / 100 END

(CASE WHEN coefficient IS NULL THEN AMOUNTS_EXTENDED_AMOUNT ELSE (AMOUNTS_EXTENDED_AMOUNT * COEFFICIENT) / 100 END * (SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."AMOUNTS_EXTENDED_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")))

("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."AMOUNTS_RECEIVED_AMOUNT" * (SELECT AVG(RATE) FROM HISTORICALEXCHANGERATE WHERE BASE_CURRENCY = "FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."AMOUNTS_RECEIVED_CURR" AND COUNTER_CURRENCY = '@@CURRENCY@@' AND YEAR(DATE) = YEAR("FINANCIALTRANSACTIONVIEW"."REPORTINGYEAR")))
